actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-1120.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5377) authorizing the President to enter into, and to proclaim modifications necessary to implement, a trade agreement with Israel providing for duty-free treatment for, and the elimination of import restrictions on, the products of Israel.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5377 (U.S.-Israeli trade).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5377) authorizing the President to enter into, and to proclaim modifications necessary to implement, a trade agreement with Israel providing for duty-free treatment for, and the elimination of import restrictions on, the products of Israel.
